metadata.name: Suspicious File Download From File Sharing Domain Via Curl.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious file download from file sharing domains using curl.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\curl.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('curl.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.githubusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('anonfiles.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cdn.discordapp.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ddns.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dl.dropboxusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ghostbin.co')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('glitch.me')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gofile.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mediafire.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mega.nz')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('onrender.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pages.dev')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('paste.ee')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastebin.pl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastetext.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pixeldrain.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privatlab.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privatlab.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('send.exploit.in')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sendspace.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storage.googleapis.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storjshare.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('supabase.co')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('temp.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('transfer.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('trycloudflare.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ufile.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('w3spaces.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('workers.dev'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--remote-name')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--output'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.msi')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.msi\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.msi"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hta')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hta\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hta"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.psm1')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.psm1\'')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.psm1"'))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious file download from file sharing domains using curl.exe
